allow: Bash(docker run --rm --entrypoint bash webpage-recorder -c "pulseaudio --start --exit-idle-time=-1 2>&1; sleep 1; ls /usr/lib/*/pulseaudio/modules/module-null-sink* 2>&1 || echo ''module not found''; pactl list modules short 2>&1 | head -20; pactl load-module module-null-sink sink_name=test 2>&1")
